author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Tianjin Pengling Rubber Hose says dividend payment date on May 7
text:
April 30(Reuters) - Tianjin Pengling Rubber Hose Co Ltd
* Says it plans to pay a cash dividend of 3.050056 yuan (before tax) per 10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 8.133484 new shares for every 10 shares for FY 2017, to shareholders of record on May 4
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 7 and the dividend will be paid on May 7
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/mSdPe3
